intro: Astronia brachybotrys, commonly known as the narrow-leaved astronia, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes many species with showy flowers and aromatic leaves. The plant features small, clustered white or pale yellow flowers that bloom throughout the year. Its leaves are typically narrow and elliptical, with a smooth or slightly hairy surface. Astronia brachybotrys is often found in shaded, moist environments such as forests or along stream banks.
